Methods in org.jboss.test.selenium.waiting that return Wait.Waiting

          Constructs preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting) with no failure.
 Wait.Waiting Wait.Waiting.dontFail()
          Sets no failure after waiting timeout.
static Wait.Waiting Wait.failWith(java.lang.String failMessage)
          Constructs preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting) with failures initialized to AssertionError with given message.

          Sets failure of timeout to AssertionError with given failMessage.
static Wait.Waiting Wait.failWith(java.lang.Throwable failure)
          Constructs preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting) with given throwable failure, which indicates timeout.
 Wait.Waiting Wait.Waiting.failWith(java.lang.Throwable failure)
          Sets failure of timeout to given throwable and return it.
static Wait.Waiting Wait.getDefault()
          Constructs default preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting).

          Constructs preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting) with given interval.

static Wait.Waiting Wait.timeout(long timeout)
          Constructs preset instance of waiting (@see Waiting) with given timeout.
 Wait.Waiting Wait.Waiting.timeout(long timeout)
          Sets waiting timeout to this instance and return it.
